question: C99 standard guarantees uniqueness of  ___________ characters for internal names.
Which of the following is true for variable names in C?
optionA: They can contain alphanumeric characters as well as special characters
optionB: Variable names cannot start with a digit
optionC: It is not an error to declare a variable to be one of the keywords
optionD: Variable can be of any length
answer: Variable names cannot start with a digit
